job.title: Geospatial Data Analyst-US Citizen
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Computer Software,Financial Services
job.description: stronguDescriptionbrbrustrongstronguJob DescriptionbrbrustrongstronguSuccessful Candidates Will Possess The Following Minimum Required SkillsbrbrustrongThe Geospatial Data Analyst position directly supports key customer mission requirements for maritime safety of navigation The position requires GIS skills to analyze manipulate convert and transform geographic data into military specified compliance while maintaining weekly and monthly milestone schedule requirementsbrulliStrong maritime product knowledge and GIS background who can demonstrate effective throughputliliDirect experience with Electronic Navigational Chart ENC andor Digital Nautical Chart DNCliliEsri ArcGIS software experience to include updating geodatabases in ArcMap managing data in ArcCatalog utilizing Product Libraries and various data editing toolbarsliliKeen attention to detail and rigorous organizational skillsliliGood communication willingness to learn and adaptive skills in order to coordinate amp contribute in a team environmentliliBachelors and 3 years of professional GIS experience required or additional years of experience in lieu of degreeliliNo clearance is required but only those who are eligible to receive one should applybrbrliulstronguDesired SkillsbrustrongulliExperience with GIS data conversion and crossproduct schema mapping would be a plusliliSQL and Python experience would be a plusbrbrliulPotential opportunity for teleworkbrbrstronguExternal Referral BonusbrbrustrongIneligiblebrbrustrongExternal Referral Bonus brbrstrongustronguPotential For TeleworkbrbrustrongYes 75brbrstronguClearance Level RequiredbrbrustrongNonebrbrstronguTravelbrbrustrongNobrbrstronguPay RangebrbrustrongRemote
